pages.text: Strongholds are rare and large underground fortresses that can be located using $(l:items/ender_eye)Ender Eyes$(). They are the entry point to the $(l:end/end)end$(), as they are the only locations where $(l:end/portal)End Portals$() can be found.

Similar to other structures, the stronghold is made out of rooms that are connected to each other. Notable rooms are the library, which always contains at least one $(l:blocks/chest)chest$() and a lot of bookshelves, and the prison, which can hold $(l:mobs/villager)villagers$() rarely.
